section.section: Each qualified voter present at the polls at 8 p.m. on election day shall be allowed to vote before the election judges commence their duties under this section.

In accordance with the provisions of this article and regulations adopted by the State Board, after the last voter has voted in an election, the election judges shall follow the instructions issued by the election director for closing the polls and for performing the tasks required in the postclosing period.

text.section:
Judges may be observed, while performing their duties under this section, until they have finished their work and leave the premises by:
authorized challengers, watchers, and observers in accordance with § 10-311 of this article;
any candidate; and
any other person lawfully present.
